note: Inverse scoring query - returns matching Demands for a given Consultant, scored by how well the consultant's experiences match each demand's requirements. No display data.

fieldDescriptions.DemandId: Demand.Id - the matched demand's unique identifier
fieldDescriptions.MatchingScore: Computed score based on requirement matching (weighted sum of partial scores across all matched requirements)
fieldDescriptions.PricePerformanceScore: 0-10 scale where 10 = best rate per score point (highest ClientOffsiteRate/MatchingScore ratio)
fieldDescriptions.MatchedRequirementsCount: Number of matched requirements (RoleSkill, Role, Industry, FunctionalArea - excludes Language)
fieldDescriptions.Count: Total number of matching demands (before pagination)
